1.title: First things first

11.content:
Your name is Robert Magee, but everyone calls you Bobby. You have short brown hair, and brown eyes. About two years ago, you discovered you had the ability to change whatever you liked, including yourself. The best part was that nobody noticed!

It was Saturday. When you first opened your eyes, it was 12:00. There was also a note on the top.You grabbed it, and read.
'Hi sweetie. We're going to be on vacation for the week. You'll be in charge. Look after your sister, and make sure nothing bad happens. Love you!'
"Figures," you say, throwing the note. Your parents had left out of the blue, and for a week. But, it could be fun. You decide to transform something.

But what?

11421.content:
You were so excited that you had this power and you were just itching to tell someone about it and to use it! Why, you just had to test your cool, new powers! So, you decide to grab your cell phone and call Jason, your sports-crazy friend from school.

Jason was tall, lean and athletic although he wasn’t like buff like a bodybuilder but now you figure you could change that! You dial his number and you tell him to come over because you want to show him something totally cool!

The doorbell rings and as soon as you open up, he stands there, short, spikey, black hair, blue eyes, thing build, long arms and legs, wearing his tank top and shorts and of course his high tops.

“Dude! What’s up?” you ask him.

“I was playing basketball! So, what did you wanna show me?” Jason asks you as he walks in. You lead him to your bedroom.

“Dude! I got this new thing! I can make you however you want to be! But, you won’t ever know the difference!” you grin.

“What the hell are you talking about, Bobby?” Jason says, as he steps on the nice rug in your bedroom.

That gives you an idea. You decide to make him younger. A LOT younger. Like… a toddler!

Suddenly, without warning, Jason starts to change. His long legs start to shrink! His long arms shorten rapidly and his big torso begins to dwindle! His head shrinks down as well as his entire body is reduced to barely a third of his height… Leaving the fourteen-year-old boy regressed back to a little baby boy!

You have to move the pile of clothes out of the way as the little baby lays on your carpet, staring at you with his small, blue eyes. He still has his short, black hair, but he’s way smaller now.

You pick him up and tickle his tummy, making him giggle as he stares at you in awe.

“Hey, little Jason! How do you like to be a baby again, huh?” you chuckle. You marvel at the fact that you have the power to regress your 14-year-old best friend into a baby just by thinking it!

After holding baby Jason in your arms for a few minutes, you decide what to do to him, next….

Amanda couldn't believe this. She was trapped in a dog's body! She wasn't even controlling it directly, only sending observations and requests to the dog's mind.
Bobby brought her into his house, scratching behind her ears.

info.brief_description: You're just like everyone else. Except you can change anyone and anything.
info.description:
You were always normal throughout your childhood, but one day, at age 14, you discovered that you had the ability to transform anyone. And anything. Yourself included. And the best part? No one even realized.

Rules:
No sex
No gay/lesbian
Don't end the story too soon
Keep it interesting
Make chapters more than three sentences (unless it's a choice chapter)
Have fun!
